page.title: 12VILLAGE CLUB---CLATFORD
page.content: In{Goodworth Clatford}there is a{ {Village Club}for the use of the village residents.This thriving club has a resident steward who lives in part of the premises.It is his job to take care of the building and grounds and take bookings.The club offers a range of facilities including inside:sewing,upholstery,snooker and { {Mothers and toddlers},drama acting.Outside tennis.It is also possible to hold dances and bar-b-qs.In the grounds there is a scout hall,largely paid for by the {Parish council}which meets in the Village Club.
